I mentioned this in a private email to Gordon, but though since it wasn't
getting any use that I'd announce here that I set up crawl08 to host the
new test suite.  Check out out here:

  http://parkert.com/crawlertestdist/

Feel fee to send me bug fixes (I'll try to get right on it) and feature
requests (will do as time permits).

I look forward to seeing what you guys can do with this data once you
throw a few crawlers at it.

Thanks,

pt.
-- 
Parker Thompson
The Internet Archive
